subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Amélie Mauresmo defeated Justine Henin-Hardenne to win the women's singles title for the first time at Wimbledon and to become the first Frenchwoman to win the tournament since 1925.
snippet: Amélie Mauresmo defeated Justine Henin-Hardenne to win the women's singles title for the first time at Wimbledon and to become the first Frenchwoman to win the tournament since 1925.
